document_data.name: Horac
document_data.mainbody: '''Horac''' was an enforcer in [[Hillsfar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Shackles of Blood|17}}
document_data.Activities: Horac was the chief enforcer for [[Margery Thrier]] of the [[Hillsfar Arena]]. Along with his assistants, his work entailed keeping the prisoners chained until they were scheduled to fight.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], some prisoners sold by [[sorcerer]] [[Breex Vandermast]] managed to escape, causing a riot.{{Cite adventurers league/Shackles of Blood|22}}
document_data.Relationship: Horac was always attended by three warriors under his orders. Often he walked in the city with Mags Thrier and her [[goliath]] slave-bodyguard.
